Comparison of optimization methods with alcohol dataset

Source: vignettes/alcohol.Rmd
alcohol.Rmd
library(ggplot2)
library(tictoc)
library(zazou)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
set.seed(42)
data(alcohol)

Abundance

dim(alcohol$X)
#> [1] 949  98

z-scores

pval_obs <- test_wilcoxon(alcohol$X, alcohol$Y)$p.value
zsco_obs <- p2z(pval_obs)

Tree

tree <- force_ultrametric(alcohol$tree)
N_branch <- length(tree$edge.length)
plot_shifts(tree, NA, obs_scores = zsco_obs)
#> Warning: Removed 1891 rows containing missing values (geom_label).

Shift estimation

L-BFGS-B

# tic()
# est_lbfgsb <- estimate_shifts3(Delta0 = rep(0, N_branch), zscores = zsco_obs,
#                                lambda = 2, tree = tree, alpha = 0.1,
#                                method = "L-BFGS-B")
# toc()
# est_lbfgsb
# plot(est_lbfgsb)

Shooting

# tic()
# est_shooting <- estimate_shifts3(Delta0 = rep(0, N_branch), zscores = zsco_obs,
#                                  lambda = 2, tree = tree, alpha = 0.1,
#                                  method = "shooting3")
# toc() # 10 times faster
# est_shooting # similar results
# plot(est_shooting)

Comparisons

# est_lbfgsb$objective_value
# est_shooting$objective_value
# est_lbfgsb$optim_info
# est_shooting$optim_info
# qplot(est_lbfgsb$zscores_obs, est_lbfgsb$zscores_est) +
#   geom_abline() + geom_vline(xintercept = 0) + coord_equal()
# qplot(est_shooting$zscores_obs, est_shooting$zscores_est) +
#   geom_abline() + geom_vline(xintercept = 0) + coord_equal()
# qplot(-est_shooting$zscores_est, -est_lbfgsb$zscores_est) +
#   geom_abline() + scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10() + coord_equal()
# qplot(-est_shooting$shift_est, -est_lbfgsb$shift_est) +
#   geom_abline() + scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10() + coord_equal()
